"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fb815d6368724016760100#post_53fb815d6368724016760100
MGS3 can accurately be described as a Cold War spy drama with plot twists around every corner, homages to classic movies and a conversation where your weapons expert tells you about a nightmare he had involving a giant turd shooting smaller turds at things that turn whatever they touch into more turds
